segments.text: I notice the angled view of this kitchen, showing all the action.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's at the sink, focused on her plate-drying routine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Unbelievably, the water's running over the edges in a steady stream.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle widens, soaking her shoe without her knowledge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's sad she misses this, potentially leading to a slip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids, meanwhile, are raiding the cookie jar stealthily.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's stool is tilting back, a fall imminent.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: With one hand in the jar and the other on a plate, he's at risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands by, arm raised in anticipation of treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their excited faces contrast the adult's obliviousness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the tied-back curtains frame a tidy garden scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This normalcy outside highlights the indoor perils.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a mix of amusement and concern watching this unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR
